metadata.name: Actaeon
metadata.description:
actaeon died killed by his own dogs after seeing artemis, the goddess of hunting and wilderness.

the ancient greek tale tells us that the world we think we are in control of, can revolt against us.

this is a video in which i finalized a 3d model prepared for a series of paintings into a virtual sculpture in grey marble and bronze inside a red marble niche.

the music wants to underline the feeling of loss and oblivion about the concept of “hubris” that seems to be almost completely lost in our days.
